00048 /* Public Functions ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00053 /*********************************************************************/
00060 void DAC_Init(LPC_DAC_TypeDef *DACx)
00061 {
00062         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_DACx(DACx));
00063         /* Set default clock divider for DAC */
00064         // CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_DAC, CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CCLK_DIV_4);
00065         //Set maximum current output
00066         DAC_SetBias(LPC_DAC,DAC_MAX_CURRENT_700uA);
00067 }
00068 
00069 /*********************************************************************/
00075 void DAC_UpdateValue (LPC_DAC_TypeDef *DACx,uint32_t dac_value)
00076 {
00077         uint32_t tmp;
00078         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_DACx(DACx));
00079         tmp = DACx->DACR & DAC_BIAS_EN;
00080         tmp |= DAC_VALUE(dac_value);
00081         // Update value
00082         DACx->DACR = tmp;
00083 }
00084 
00085 /*********************************************************************/
00092 void DAC_SetBias (LPC_DAC_TypeDef *DACx,uint32_t bias)
00093 {
00094         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_DAC_CURRENT_OPT(bias));
00095         DACx->DACR &=~DAC_BIAS_EN;
00096         if (bias  == DAC_MAX_CURRENT_350uA)
00097         {
00098                 DACx->DACR |= DAC_BIAS_EN;
00099         }
00100 }
00101 
00102 /*********************************************************************/
00111 void DAC_ConfigDAConverterControl (LPC_DAC_TypeDef *DACx,DAC_CONVERTER_CFG_Type *DAC_ConverterConfigStruct)
00112 {
00113         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_DACx(DACx));
00114         DACx->DACCTRL &= ~DAC_DACCTRL_MASK;
00115         if (DAC_ConverterConfigStruct->DBLBUF_ENA)
00116                 DACx->DACCTRL   |= DAC_DBLBUF_ENA;
00117         if (DAC_ConverterConfigStruct->CNT_ENA)
00118                 DACx->DACCTRL   |= DAC_CNT_ENA;
00119         if (DAC_ConverterConfigStruct->DMA_ENA)
00120                 DACx->DACCTRL   |= DAC_DMA_ENA;
00121 }
00122 
00123 /*********************************************************************/
00129 void DAC_SetDMATimeOut(LPC_DAC_TypeDef *DACx, uint32_t time_out)
00130 {
00131         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_DACx(DACx));
00132         DACx->DACCNTVAL = DAC_CCNT_VALUE(time_out);
00133 }
00134 
00139 #endif /* _DAC */
